XXadbhutdu:1: [0] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma
XXadbhutdu:3: [1] athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat. adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ
XXadbhutdu:5: ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam. dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasyaitad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayitvā caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā
XXadbhutdu:6: tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt? athāyuṣmata ānandasyaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ. yaṇv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā me sa bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ
XXadbhutdu:8: [2] athāyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtya paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt. ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando
XXadbhutdu:9: bhagavantam idam avocat. ihāhaṃ bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣaṃ. so 'ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare
XXadbhutdu:10: sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram
XXadbhutdu:11: ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ
XXadbhutdu:12: samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt? tasya mamaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ. yanv aham etam
XXadbhutdu:13: evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ
XXadbhutdu:15: [3] evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānanda, idam avocat. sādhu sādhv ānanda
XXadbhutdu:16: bahujanahitāya tvam ānanda pratipanno ca bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam evārthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. tena hy ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru,
XXadbhutdu:17: bhāṣiṣye. jambūdvīpo hy ānanda dvīpaḥ saptayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa
XXadbhutdu:18: uttaraviśālo dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyo
XXadbhutdu:20: niryātayet. yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ vā
XXadbhutdu:21: yaṣṭim āropayet badarīpatramātracchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet, idam evānanda tataḥ
XXadbhutdu:23: [4] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda pūrvavideho nāma dvīpo 'ṣṭauyojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantād ardhacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:24: tam enaṃ kaścit śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:25: [5] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānandāvaragodānīyo nāma dvīpo navayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt pūrṇacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:26: tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram
XXadbhutdu:27: yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:28: [6] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:29: tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda uttarakurur nāma dvīpaḥ daśayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt samantacaturasraḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac
XXadbhutdu:30: cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:31: [7] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpas. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:32: tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic
XXadbhutdu:33: chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:34: [8] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:35: tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ. asty ānanda trisāharsamahāsāhasro
XXadbhutdu:36: lokadhātuḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyo 'nāgāmibhyo
XXadbhutdu:37: 'rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaś yāvac cāturdiśe vā bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed
XXadbhutdu:38: yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:39: [9] tat kasya hetoḥ. aprameyo hy ānanda tathāgato dānenāprameyaḥ śīlenāprameyaḥ kṣāntyāprameyo vīryeṇāprameyo tyāgenāprameyo maitryāprameyaḥ karuṇayāprameyo muditayāprameya upekṣayā caturbhir
XXadbhutdu:40: vaiśāradyais daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair aprameyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgato hy ānanda tathāgato 'rhan
XXadbhutdu:42: [10] evam ukto āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ. ko nāmāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:43: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyam
XXadbhutdu:44: adbhutam adbhutadharmaparyāyaṃ iti dhāraya. idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te bhikṣava āyuṣmāṃś cānando bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan.
